issue.title: [R] Update README example to reflect new capabilities
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14365](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14365). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we can use aggregate functions as well as joins we should update the examples in readme.md to include those functionalities.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14365?focusedCommentId=17438297) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
